text: The thing is we were overseas
How many luggages to fit all these 😂
Excess baggages expensive leh. Usually I will opt for shipping. 😂

Sometimes shipping not so cheap also.
If the items are small still okay
But ok lah from overseas we tend to buy more cause we feel sg don't have
Ya Lor. But more convenient especially food stuffs and bulky items.
IKR. And the feeling of 过了这个村就没有这个店了。
He got like 7  8 paper bags of the clothes but coming from UK  he paid like 800£ or so which is considered cheap for so many bags n bags of stuffs? 😅
Really pass liao means bye liao
Aiya my that friend always fly so he has the mileage whatever whatever so it's free
YES! Later missed Liao then at night cannot sleep. 😂
Everytime never buy  come back I will sad n keep thinking about it for years n years I can nag at uncle about it
I feel you. Once gone is like forever gone.
For haagen dazs ice cream I saw in Vancouver back then for like 5 bucks a tub. I want to buy then he was like diao me say winter n snowing  eat simi ice cream..
Came back I pull him to ntuc n show him a normal price for haagen in sg
He don’t know. That’s the perfect time to Jiak ice cream leh.
I think I nag a whole year
Ikr! Ice cream doesn't melt.. so shiok
nag until now say why i never buy the volcanic rock whisky coolers
The husband/boyfriend should just encourage them to buy. 😂
He let me buy in sg but the feeling is not the same!!
Sometimes we know what we wanted  we just need a bit of encouragement so that we can be guilt free. 😂
Anyways from then on  we go cold countries overseas  he let me buy ice cream already 🤣🤣🤣🤣
But yes I still continue nagging about it.. 😜😜😜
If he let me bought it back then  it was just 5 bucks 😝
See lah  today I nag again about the ice cream.. hahahaha 😆
52 weeks is an understatement 😂
End of the day  this applies 🤣🤣
They should just set this as their wallpaper

🤣 I die die find back this pic lol

So long ago still bring back

So you will forget about it tomorrow morning
See she how petty  still keep the picture from 2015😒
their folders dun get deleted de

can share what type and size you buy? i need to get myself some
It feels like yesterday just happened

I come back as ghost also haunt u for it
